column1: Kata Robata////My favs are: King Uni Spoon ($7 a bite
column2: but worth every bite) Chawanmushi (loaded with Uni and lobster
column5: Oysters in a vinaigrette sauce (I've had different versions
column6: but today was one of my favorite- cilantro vinaigrette and topped with fish roe)
column7: award-winning lobster mac & cheese (strange place to find it
column8: but the best in the city
